title: CCTV+: China Up Close: Zhejiang Tour Explores Deqing
content:
BEIJING, Aug. 14, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- From August 8 to 10, 2025, the "China Up Close Series: Zhejiang Tour" brought a contingent of nearly 70 journalists and editors from South Korea, Spain, Bulgaria, and Iceland to Deqing, a county in Zhejiang province. Alongside CGTN (China Global Television Network), they trained their cameras and notebooks on the area, aiming to capture its landscapes, history and cultural rhythms for audiences abroad.

summary: The "China Up Close Series: Zhejiang Tour" took place from August 8 to 10, 2025, featuring nearly 70 journalists and editors from South Korea, Spain, Bulgaria, and Iceland. The tour was part of an effort to capture the area's landscapes, history, and cultural rhythms for international audiences. However, Morningstar does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, timeliness, or reliability of any third-party content.
shortSummary: A major international tour, featuring 70 journalists and a team of experts, explored Deqing in China's Zhejiang province to capture the nation's cultural heart.
argos_summary: From August 8 to 10, 2025, the "China Up Close Series: Zhejiang Tour" hosted nearly 70 journalists and editors from various countries, including South Korea, Spain, Bulgaria, and Iceland, in Deqing, Zhejiang province. The event, organized in collaboration with CGTN, aimed to showcase the region's landscapes, history, and culture to international audiences.
